About Jasmine

Hi there! This is Jasmine✨ I am a data-driven, user-focused web developer. With critical and creative thinking as well as programming skills, I can address business problems and implement digital solutions. I have honed my programming skills and ability to design digital products through Le Wagon program, and now pursuing a master's in Information Systems to learn how to approach technology to manage the complexities of digital transformation. During my free time, I enjoy cafe-hopping in the city.☕️

Veracity

A platform that helps Western purchasers verify the authenticity of Chinese supplier certifications. Verify against the FDA database.

Mister Cocktail

Provide Cocktail recommendation for girls nights, serve as your cocktail manager, and store your favorite cocktails recipes.

Built with Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, and connect cocktail API for you to explore cockatil recipes. You can also add, edit, delete, and filter drinks.
